org.ntnu.utility
Class GuiToolbox

java.lang.Object
  org.ntnu.utility.GuiToolbox

 class GuiToolbox
extends java.lang.Object

This class provides some common gui functions.

Author:
Martin Matusiak

Method Detail

createGuiBorder

public static javax.swing.border.Border createGuiBorder(int innerwidth,
                                                        int outerwidth,
                                                        javax.swing.border.Border border)
A CompoundBorder can only use two borders, this method takes a border and wraps it with two EmptyBorders to get some space between the border and the content.

Parameters:
innerwidth - padding inside the border
outerwidth - padding outside the border
border - the border to wrap around

public static void markFieldError(javax.swing.JTextField field)

resetFieldMarkers

public static void resetFieldMarkers(java.util.ArrayList inputFields)
Reset the marking done by the makrField* methods.

getMultilineJLabel

public static javax.swing.JPanel getMultilineJLabel(java.lang.String text)

getMultilineJLabel

public static javax.swing.JPanel getMultilineJLabel(java.lang.String text,
                                                    java.awt.Color color)
JLabels can not be multiline. This method takes a string with linebreaks and creates a JLabel on a JPanel for every segment of the string between linebreaks.

Parameters:
text - The text of the label
color - The color of the text

getFixedWidthString

public static java.lang.String getFixedWidthString(java.lang.String string,
                                                   int width)
Take a string of unknown size and expand it to a fixed size.

Parameters:
string - The string to expand
width - The requested size

setUI

public static void setUI(int lnf,
                         java.util.ArrayList windows)
Set the look and feel of the application. The input is an ArrayList of Window objects, which make up the application.

Parameters:
lnf - The look and feel (as public constant of the class)
windows - The collection of Window objects to set the lnf for
